messages.msgSnippet: The summer issue of Self-University Newsletter is now available at http://www.autodidactic.com/selfnews.htm The subject of this issue is the concept of
messages.messageBody:
The summer issue of "Self-University Newsletter" is now available at
http://www.autodidactic.com/selfnews.htm

The subject of this issue is the concept of "memes." An excerpt from the essay:

"Nothing today is more sought after than the attention of human beings.
Manufactures, educators, religions, cults, sales organizations, publishers,
advertisers, politicians, celebrities, and all of the various kinds of
media vie for our mindfulness. Can we afford that any of these entities
should know more than we do about how we acquire, keep, hold, and pass on
our ideas?"

"Self-University Newsletter" is free. Please tell anyone you think might be
interested to stop by for a look. We will continue to notify you each time
a new issue is posted (unless you request otherwise). To cancel
notification simply send us an e-mail message with cancel subscription in
the subject and or the body of the text. Be assured, we do not make our
subscription list available to anyone for any reason.

Charles D. Hayes
907-376-2932 voice & fax
e-mail autpress@...
URL http://www.autodidactic.com
